entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow or ice pellets beginning this evening and ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
